experiences.title: Social Media Manager
experiences.description: As a Social Media Manager, I crafted engaging content, managed online presence, and boosted brand awareness across social media platforms to drive audience engagement and growth.

experiences.title: Sales & Marketing Manager
experiences.description: As a Sales & Marketing Manager, I led sales initiatives, developed marketing strategies, and built strong client relationships to drive revenue growth and enhance brand presence.

experiences.title: Sales & Marketing Executive
experiences.description: As a Sales & Marketing Executive at Ezone International Pvt Ltd, I drove sales growth, managed client relationships, and executed marketing strategies to boost brand visibility and engagement.
